name: Fairfield Inn & Suites Towanda Wysox

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We decided to stay at this hotel since it was new and choose this hotel since we usually stay at Marriotts. The hotel has only been open for a few weeks.
reviews.title: Brand new hotel

description: The Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott hotel in Towanda, PA is a newly opened 88 room hotel in Northeast Pennsylvania. Just a short drive from the New York border, guests will find themselves amidst the beauty of the Endless Mountain Region of PA. Guest of our Towanda hotel will be treated to a variety of convenient amenities including a complimentary breakfast, complimentary wireless Internet, an indoor pool and a fitness center. Each guest room features a flat-screen HDTV, coffee maker, luxurious bedding package and a spacious work desk.For the business traveler, our hotel is conveniently located in the Marcellus Shale Region and near great companies like DuPont, Cargill, Proctor & Gamble and Moxie Energy. The leisure traveler might be surprised to find themselves just a short drive away from some unique attractions like the French Azilum, Mt. Pisgah State Park and the Grand Canyon of Pennsylvania. Daytrips from Towanda could easily include Scranton, Binghamton and Corning, NY.
